attributes.action: Include Nigel Farage in negotiating Great Britain's withdrawal from the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Mr. Farage has worked tirelessly for many years and has been instrumental in bringing about the recent EU referendum.
As an MEP, he is familiar with the workings of the EU and as a prominent leave campaigner, we believe he will help secure the best terms for Great Britain's exit from the EU.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, demand that Nigel Farage, MEP, be included in negotiations with the EU regarding Great Britain's withdrawal from the EU.
